transcript: Hi, this is Carlos. I stopped taking med for me because it makes me dizzy

key_facts: Patient reported stopped taking medication due to side effect
result.recommended_next_step: Pharmacist outreach within 24 hours to address side-effect concern and adherence barrier.
result.safe_patient_reply: We will discuss your concerns about dizziness with your medication at your next appointment. Your pharmacist may need to adjust your treatment plan. If symptoms worsen or you feel unsafe, please seek urgent care.

soap_note.subjective: Patient reports dizziness with current medication
soap_note.plan: Pharmacist to review transcript and follow up with patient.

pharmacist_task.summary: Review patient's medication regimen due to reported side effects
